name: Achievement Dummy
description:
Here is a simple but very fun game that will definitely help you relieve stress after a hard day or just have fun. At your disposal an Arsenal of a variety of items, eager for destruction. And one unfortunate mannequin, who will experience all their action. Try to do as much damage as possible with minimal cost to complete all levels. Or just have fun in the sandbox!Features:
  • Fun game;
  • There is a sandbox mode;
  • Many levels;
  • Suitable for Windows, Mac and Linux.

Would you like to find out what can cause more damage - spiked wall, six-barrel minigun or rocket launcher? Would you like to arrange for your dummy real ping pong? Then rather go into the game and try all the means of destruction that will be kindly offered to you for damage. Among them you will find mines, automatic crossbow, six-barrel, rocket launcher, spikes, saw, edged weapons, repulsive surfaces and much more. A whole Arsenal at your disposal. Have fun and have fun at your leisure. Many levels in the game will not let you get bored.
